snippet: At Roxbury, Mass., Sept. 28, of consumption, HERBERT A. MORRIS, son of Warren and Rebecca Thayer, aged I year 6 months and 3 days. At Roxbury Mass., 26th ult. ABIGAIL L., wife of Joseph F. Perry, aged 43 years. At Cambridge, Oct. 3, Miss ELIZABETH...
lead_paragraph: At Roxbury, Mass., Sept. 28, of consumption, HERBERT A. MORRIS, son of Warren and Rebecca Thayer, aged I year 6 months and 3 days. At Roxbury Mass., 26th ult. ABIGAIL L., wife of Joseph F. Perry, aged 43 years. At Cambridge, Oct. 3, Miss ELIZABETH LYDSTONE BOND, aged 22 years.
